thm isxmet(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c2, cfv(cxmet, c0)), wa(wf(c2, cxp(c0, c0), cxr), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wa(wb(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), nat0), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wral(s2, c0, wbr(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cle, co(co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s0)), cxad, co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s1)))))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
} = {
  bitrd(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfv(cxmet, c0)), wa(wf(c2, cxp(c0, c0), cxr), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wa(wb(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), nat0), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wral(s2, c0, wbr(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cle, co(co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s0)), cxad, co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s1))))))))), wa(wcel(c2, co(cxr, cmap, cxp(c0, c0))), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wa(wb(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), nat0), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wral(s2, c0, wbr(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cle, co(co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s0)), cxad, co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s1))))))))))
  syl6bb(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfv(cxmet, c0)), wa(wcel(c2, co(cxr, cmap, cxp(c0, c0))), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wa(wb(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), nat0), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wral(s2, c0, wbr(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cle, co(co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s0)), cxad, co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s1))))))))), wcel(c2, crab(hs0, co(cxr, cmap, cxp(c0, c0)), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wa(wb(wceq(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), nat0), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wral(s2, c0, wbr(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cle, co(co(cv(s2), cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cxad, co(cv(s2), cv(hs0), cv(s1)))))))))))
  eleq2d(c2, cfv(cxmet, c0), crab(hs0, co(cxr, cmap, cxp(c0, c0)), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wa(wb(wceq(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), nat0), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wral(s2, c0, wbr(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cle, co(co(cv(s2), cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cxad, co(cv(s2), cv(hs0), cv(s1))))))))), wcel(c0, c1))
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(cxmet, c0), crab(hs0, co(cxr, cmap, cxp(c0, c0)), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wa(wb(wceq(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), nat0), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wral(s2, c0, wbr(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cle, co(co(cv(s2), cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cxad, co(cv(s2), cv(hs0), cv(s1)))))))))), wcel(c0, universe))
  elex(c0, c1)
  fvmpt(hs1, c0, universe, cxmet, crab(hs0, co(cxr, cmap, cxp(c0, c0)), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wa(wb(wceq(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), nat0), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wral(s2, c0, wbr(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cle, co(co(cv(s2), cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cxad, co(cv(s2), cv(hs0), cv(s1))))))))), crab(hs0, co(cxr, cmap, cxp(cv(hs1), cv(hs1))), wral(s0, cv(hs1), wral(s1, cv(hs1), wa(wb(wceq(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), nat0), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wral(s2, cv(hs1), wbr(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cle, co(co(cv(s2), cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cxad, co(cv(s2), cv(hs0), cv(s1))))))))))
  rabeqbidv(hs0, co(cxr, cmap, cxp(cv(hs1), cv(hs1))), co(cxr, cmap, cxp(c0, c0)), wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wral(s0, cv(hs1), wral(s1, cv(hs1), wa(wb(wceq(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), nat0), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wral(s2, cv(hs1), wbr(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cle, co(co(cv(s2), cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cxad, co(cv(s2), cv(hs0), cv(s1)))))))), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wa(wb(wceq(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), nat0), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wral(s2, c0, wbr(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cle, co(co(cv(s2), cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cxad, co(cv(s2), cv(hs0), cv(s1)))))))))
  oveq2d(cxr, cmap, cxp(cv(hs1), cv(hs1)), cxp(c0, c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c0))

blocks.name: ismeti
blocks.content: Properties that determine a metric. (Contributed by NM, 17-Nov-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 14-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ismeti(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, c1))
  -| wcel(c1, universe)
  -| wf(c0, cxp(c1, c1), cr)
  -| wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wb(wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), nat0), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  -| wi(w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c1)), wbr(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), cle, co(co(cv(s2), c0, cv(s0)), caddc, co(cv(s2), c0, cv(s1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
} = {
  mpbir2an(wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, c1)), wf(c0, cxp(c1, c1), cr), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wa(wb(wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), nat0), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wral(s2, c1, wbr(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), cle, co(co(cv(s2), c0, cv(s0)), caddc, co(cv(s2), c0, cv(s1)))))))))
  rgen2a(s0, s1, c1, wa(wb(wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), nat0), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wral(s2, c1, wbr(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), cle, co(co(cv(s2), c0, cv(s0)), caddc, co(cv(s2), c0, cv(s1)))))))
  jca(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wb(wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), nat0), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wral(s2, c1, wbr(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), cle, co(co(cv(s2), c0, cv(s0)), caddc, co(cv(s2), c0, cv(s1))))))
  ralrimiva(s2, c1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wbr(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), cle, co(co(cv(s2), c0, cv(s0)), caddc, co(cv(s2), c0, cv(s1)))))
  3expa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c1), wbr(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), cle, co(co(cv(s2), c0, cv(s0)), caddc, co(cv(s2), c0, cv(s1)))))
  ax-mp(wb(wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, c1)), wa(wf(c0, cxp(c1, c1), cr), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wa(wb(wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), nat0), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wral(s2, c1, wbr(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), cle, co(co(cv(s2), c0, cv(s0)), caddc, co(cv(s2), c0, cv(s1)))))))))), wcel(c1, universe))
  ismet(s0, s1, s2, c1, universe, c0)
  diff.wa.s(s2, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1))
  diff.wcel.s(s2, cv(s0), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, cv(s1), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
}

blocks.name: isxmetd
blocks.content: Properties that determine an extended metric. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm isxmetd(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, universe))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, cxp(c1, c1), cxr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wb(wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), nat0), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c1))), wbr(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), cle, co(co(cv(s2), c0, cv(s0)), cxad, co(cv(s2), c0, cv(s1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  mpbir2and(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wf(c0, cxp(c1, c1), cxr), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wa(wb(wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), nat0), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wral(s2, c1, wbr(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), cle, co(co(cv(s2), c0, cv(s0)), cxad, co(cv(s2), c0, cv(s1)))))))))
  ralrimivva(s0, s1, c1, c1, w0, wa(wb(wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), nat0), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wral(s2, c1, wbr(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), cle, co(co(cv(s2), c0, cv(s0)), cxad, co(cv(s2), c0, cv(s1)))))))
  jca(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wb(wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), nat0), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wral(s2, c1, wbr(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), cle, co(co(cv(s2), c0, cv(s0)), cxad, co(cv(s2), c0, cv(s1))))))
  ralrimiv(s2, c1, wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wbr(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), cle, co(co(cv(s2), c0, cv(s0)), cxad, co(cv(s2), c0, cv(s1)))))
  imp32(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wi(wcel(cv(s2), c1), wbr(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), cle, co(co(cv(s2), c0, cv(s0)), cxad, co(cv(s2), c0, cv(s1))))))
  3exp2(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c1), wbr(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), cle, co(co(cv(s2), c0, cv(s0)), cxad, co(cv(s2), c0, cv(s1)))))
  syl(w0, wb(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wa(wf(c0, cxp(c1, c1), cxr), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wa(wb(wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), nat0), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wral(s2, c1, wbr(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), cle, co(co(cv(s2), c0, cv(s0)), cxad, co(cv(s2), c0, cv(s1)))))))))), wcel(c1, universe))
  isxmet(s0, s1, s2, c1, universe, c0)
  diff.wa.s(s2, w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1)))
  diff.wa.s(s2, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1))
  diff.wcel.s(s2, cv(s0), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, cv(s1), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
}

blocks.name: isxmet2d
blocks.content: It is safe to only require the triangle inequality when the values are real (so that we can use the standard addition over the reals), but in this case the nonnegativity constraint cannot be deduced and must be provided separately. (Counterexample: ` D ( x , y ) = if ( x = y , 0 , -oo ) ` satisfies all hypotheses except nonnegativity.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm isxmet2d(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, universe))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, cxp(c1, c1), cxr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wbr(nat0, cle, co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wb(wbr(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), cle, nat0), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  -| wi(w3a(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c1)), wa(wcel(co(cv(s2), c0, cv(s0)), cr), wcel(co(cv(s2), c0, cv(s1)), cr))), wbr(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), cle, co(co(cv(s2), c0, cv(s0)), caddc, co(cv(s2), c0, cv(s1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  isxmetd(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, w0)
  3bitr2d(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), nat0), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wa(wbr(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), cle, nat0), wbr(nat0, cle, co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))), wbr(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), cle, nat0))
  sylancl(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wb(wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), nat0), wa(wbr(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), cle, nat0), wbr(nat0, cle, co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))))), wcel(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), cxr), wcel(nat0, cxr))
  0xr()
  xrletri3(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), nat0)
  biantrud(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wbr(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), cle, nat0), wbr(nat0, cle, co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))))
  mpjao3dan(wa(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c1))), wbr(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), cle, co(co(cv(s2), c0, cv(s0)), cxad, co(cv(s2), c0, cv(s1)))), wcel(co(cv(s2), c0, cv(s0)), cr), wceq(co(cv(s2), c0, cv(s0)), cpnf), wceq(co(cv(s2), c0, cv(s0)), cmnf))

blocks.name: metflem
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ metf and others. (Contributed by NM, 30-Aug-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 14-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm metflem(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, c1)), wa(wf(c0, cxp(c1, c1), cr), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wa(wb(wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), nat0), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wral(s2, c1, wbr(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), cle, co(co(cv(s2), c0, cv(s0)), caddc, co(cv(s2), c0, cv(s1))))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
} = {
  ibi(wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, c1)), wa(wf(c0, cxp(c1, c1), cr), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wa(wb(wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), nat0), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wral(s2, c1, wbr(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), cle, co(co(cv(s2), c0, cv(s0)), caddc, co(cv(s2), c0, cv(s1))))))))))
  syl(wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, c1)), wb(wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, c1)), wa(wf(c0, cxp(c1, c1), cr), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wa(wb(wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), nat0), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wral(s2, c1, wbr(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), cle, co(co(cv(s2), c0, cv(s0)), caddc, co(cv(s2), c0, cv(s1)))))))))), wcel(c1, cdm(cmet)))
  elfvdm(c0, cmet, c1)
  ismet(s0, s1, s2, c1, cdm(cmet), c0)
}

blocks.name: xmetf
blocks.content: Mapping of the distance function of an extended metric. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm xmetf(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wf(c0, cxp(c1, c1), cxr))
} = {
  simpld(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wf(c0, cxp(c1, c1), cxr), wral(hs0, c1, wral(hs1, c1, wa(wb(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), nat0), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wral(hs2, c1, wbr(co(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), cle, co(co(cv(hs2), c0, cv(hs0)), cxad, co(cv(hs2), c0, cv(hs1)))))))))
  ibi(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wa(wf(c0, cxp(c1, c1), cxr), wral(hs0, c1, wral(hs1, c1, wa(wb(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), nat0), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wral(hs2, c1, wbr(co(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), cle, co(co(cv(hs2), c0, cv(hs0)), cxad, co(cv(hs2), c0, cv(hs1))))))))))
  syl(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wb(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wa(wf(c0, cxp(c1, c1), cxr), wral(hs0, c1, wral(hs1, c1, wa(wb(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), nat0), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wral(hs2, c1, wbr(co(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), cle, co(co(cv(hs2), c0, cv(hs0)), cxad, co(cv(hs2), c0, cv(hs1)))))))))), wcel(c1, cdm(cxmet)))
  elfvdm(c0, cxmet, c1)
  isxmet(hs0, hs1, hs2, c1, cdm(cxmet), c0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm xmetf(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈(*Met ` c1)→(c0 :(c1 × c1)→ ℝ*))
} = {
  simpld(c0 ∈(*Met ` c1), (c0 :(c1 × c1)→ ℝ*), ∀(hs0 ∈ c1, ∀(hs1 ∈ c1,(((hs0[c0]hs1)= 0 ↔ hs0 = hs1)∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ c1,(hs0[c0]hs1)[≤]((hs2[c0]hs0)[+](hs2[c0]hs1)))))))
  ibi(c0 ∈(*Met ` c1), ((c0 :(c1 × c1)→ ℝ*)∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ c1, ∀(hs1 ∈ c1,(((hs0[c0]hs1)= 0 ↔ hs0 = hs1)∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ c1,(hs0[c0]hs1)[≤]((hs2[c0]hs0)[+](hs2[c0]hs1))))))))
  syl(c0 ∈(*Met ` c1), (c0 ∈(*Met ` c1)↔((c0 :(c1 × c1)→ ℝ*)∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ c1, ∀(hs1 ∈ c1,(((hs0[c0]hs1)= 0 ↔ hs0 = hs1)∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ c1,(hs0[c0]hs1)[≤]((hs2[c0]hs0)[+](hs2[c0]hs1)))))))), c1 ∈ dom(*Met))
  elfvdm(c0, cxmet, c1)
  isxmet(hs0, hs1, hs2, c1, dom(*Met), c0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
}

thm metf(class c0, class c1) {

  simpld(wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, c1)), wf(c0, cxp(c1, c1), cr), wral(hs0, c1, wral(hs1, c1, wa(wb(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), nat0), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wral(hs2, c1, wbr(co(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), cle, co(co(cv(hs2), c0, cv(hs0)), caddc, co(cv(hs2), c0, cv(hs1)))))))))
  metflem(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
}

thm metf(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈(Met ` c1)→(c0 :(c1 × c1)→ ℝ))
} = {
  simpld(c0 ∈(Met ` c1), (c0 :(c1 × c1)→ ℝ), ∀(hs0 ∈ c1, ∀(hs1 ∈ c1,(((hs0[c0]hs1)= 0 ↔ hs0 = hs1)∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ c1,(hs0[c0]hs1)[≤]((hs2[c0]hs0)[+](hs2[c0]hs1)))))))
  metflem(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0, c1)

  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)

  ovex(cxr, cmap, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)))
  df-xmet(hs0, hs3, hs1, hs2, hs4)
  fnunirn(hs0, cxmet, universe, c0)
  rexlimivw(hs0, universe, wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, cv(hs0))), wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, cdm(cdm(c0)))))
  eleqtrd(c0, cfv(cxmet, cdm(cdm(c0))), cfv(cxmet, cv(hs0)), wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, cv(hs0))))

  diff.hs0.s(hs1)

  diff.hs1.s(hs2)

thm xmetunirn(class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ ⋃ ran(*Met)↔ c0 ∈(*Met ` dom(dom(c0))))
} = {
  impbii(c0 ∈ ⋃ ran(*Met), c0 ∈(*Met ` dom(dom(c0))))
  sylbi(c0 ∈ ⋃ ran(*Met), c0 ∈(*Met ` dom(dom(c0))), ∃(hs0 ∈ 𝕌, c0 ∈(*Met ` hs0)))
  ax-mp((c0 ∈ ⋃ ran(*Met)↔ ∃(hs0 ∈ 𝕌, c0 ∈(*Met ` hs0))), *Met[Fn]𝕌)
  fnmpti(hs0, cxmet, universe, { hs3 ∈(ℝ*[↦](hs0 × hs0))| ∀(hs1 ∈ hs0, ∀(hs2 ∈ hs0,(((hs1[hs3]hs2)= 0 ↔ hs1 = hs2)∧ ∀(hs4 ∈ hs0,(hs1[hs3]hs2)[≤]((hs4[hs3]hs1)[+](hs4[hs3]hs2))))))})
  rabex(hs3, (ℝ*[↦](hs0 × hs0)), ∀(hs1 ∈ hs0, ∀(hs2 ∈ hs0,(((hs1[hs3]hs2)= 0 ↔ hs1 = hs2)∧ ∀(hs4 ∈ hs0,(hs1[hs3]hs2)[≤]((hs4[hs3]hs1)[+](hs4[hs3]hs2)))))))
  ovex(cxr, cmap, (hs0 × hs0))
  df-xmet(hs0, hs3, hs1, hs2, hs4)
  fnunirn(hs0, cxmet, universe, c0)
  rexlimivw(hs0, universe, c0 ∈(*Met ` hs0), c0 ∈(*Met ` dom(dom(c0))))
  eleqtrd(c0, (*Met ` dom(dom(c0))), (*Met ` hs0), c0 ∈(*Met ` hs0))
  id(c0 ∈(*Met ` hs0))
  fveq2d(cxmet, hs0, dom(dom(c0)), c0 ∈(*Met ` hs0))
  xmetdmdm(c0, hs0)
  sseli(c0, (*Met ` dom(dom(c0))), ⋃ ran(*Met))
  fvssunirn(cxmet, dom(dom(c0)))
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs3.c((ℝ*[↦](hs0 × hs0)))
  diff.hs3.s(hs4)
  diff.hs0.s(hs3)
  diff.hs3.s(hs1)
  diff.hs3.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs4)
  diff.hs1.s(hs4)
  diff.hs2.s(hs4)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(cxmet)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ∈(*Met ` dom(dom(c0))))
}

  oveq2d(co(c2, c0, c3), cxad, co(c2, c0, c2), nat0, w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1), wceq(co(c2, c0, c2), nat0))
  xmet0(c0, c1, c2)
  xaddid1d(co(c2, c0, c3), w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)))
  xmetcl(c0, c1, c2, c3)
}

  ralrimiva(hs2, c1, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs1), c1)), wbr(co(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), cle, co(co(cv(hs2), c0, cv(hs0)), cxad, co(cv(hs2), c0, cv(hs1)))))

  3anrot(wcel(cv(hs2), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1))

  syl(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wb(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wa(wf(c0, cxp(c1, c1), cxr), wral(hs0, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs0)), nat0), wral(hs1, c1, wral(hs2, c1, wbr(co(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), cle, co(co(cv(hs2), c0, cv(hs0)), cxad, co(cv(hs2), c0, cv(hs1)))))))))), wcel(c1, universe))

  ralrimiva(hs2, c1, ((c0 ∈(*Met ` c1)∧ hs0 ∈ c1)∧ hs1 ∈ c1), (hs0[c0]hs1)[≤]((hs2[c0]hs0)[+](hs2[c0]hs1)))
  3anassrs(c0 ∈(*Met ` c1), hs0 ∈ c1, hs1 ∈ c1, hs2 ∈ c1, (hs0[c0]hs1)[≤]((hs2[c0]hs0)[+](hs2[c0]hs1)))
  sylan2br(c0 ∈(*Met ` c1), (hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ∈ c1 ∧ hs2 ∈ c1), (hs0[c0]hs1)[≤]((hs2[c0]hs0)[+](hs2[c0]hs1)), (hs2 ∈ c1 ∧ hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ∈ c1))
  3anrot(hs2 ∈ c1, hs0 ∈ c1, hs1 ∈ c1)
  xmettri2(c0, c1, hs2, hs0, hs1)
  syl(c0 ∈(*Met ` c1), (c0 ∈(PsMet ` c1)↔((c0 :(c1 × c1)→ ℝ*)∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ c1,((hs0[c0]hs0)= 0 ∧ ∀(hs1 ∈ c1, ∀(hs2 ∈ c1,(hs0[c0]hs1)[≤]((hs2[c0]hs0)[+](hs2[c0]hs1)))))))), c1 ∈ 𝕌)

  xmetsym(c0, c1, cv(hs0), cv(hs1))

  simpr2(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1))
  xmettri2(c0, c1, c4, c2, c3)
  oveq1d(co(c4, c0, c2), cxad, co(c4, c0, c3), co(c2, c0, c4), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), w3a(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1))))
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), w3a(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1))), wceq(co(c4, c0, c2), co(c2, c0, c4)), wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c4, c1), wcel(c2, c1))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), w3a(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1)))

  sylan2b(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), w3a(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1)), wbr(co(c2, c0, c4), cle, co(co(c2, c0, c3), cxad, co(c3, c0, c4))), w3a(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c4, c1), wcel(c3, c1)))
  3ancomb(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1))
  xmettri(c0, c1, c2, c4, c3)

  3adant3r2(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1), wcel(co(c2, c0, c4), cxr))

  3adant3r1(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1), wcel(co(c3, c0, c4), cxr))

blocks.name: xmetrtri2
blocks.content: The reverse triangle inequality for the distance function of an extended metric. In order to express the "extended absolute value function", we use the distance function ~ xrsdsval defined on the extended real structure. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm xmetrtri2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), w3a(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1))), wbr(co(co(c2, c0, c4), c5, co(c3, c0, c4)), cle, co(c2, c0, c3)))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cds, cxrs))
} = {
  eqbrtrd(co(co(c2, c0, c4), c5, co(c3, c0, c4)), cle, co(c2, c0, c3), cif(co(co(c3, c0, c4), cxad, cxne(co(c2, c0, c4))), co(co(c2, c0, c4), cxad, cxne(co(c3, c0, c4))), wbr(co(c2, c0, c4), cle, co(c3, c0, c4))), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), w3a(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1))))
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), w3a(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1))), wceq(co(co(c2, c0, c4), c5, co(c3, c0, c4)), cif(co(co(c3, c0, c4), cxad, cxne(co(c2, c0, c4))), co(co(c2, c0, c4), cxad, cxne(co(c3, c0, c4))), wbr(co(c2, c0, c4), cle, co(c3, c0, c4)))), wcel(co(c2, c0, c4), cxr), wcel(co(c3, c0, c4), cxr))
  3adant3r2(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1), wcel(co(c2, c0, c4), cxr))
  xmetcl(c0, c1, c2, c4)
  3adant3r1(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1), wcel(co(c3, c0, c4), cxr))
  xmetcl(c0, c1, c3, c4)
  xrsdsval(co(c2, c0, c4), co(c3, c0, c4), c5)
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), w3a(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1))), wbr(cif(co(co(c3, c0, c4), cxad, cxne(co(c2, c0, c4))), co(co(c2, c0, c4), cxad, cxne(co(c3, c0, c4))), wbr(co(c2, c0, c4), cle, co(c3, c0, c4))), cle, co(c2, c0, c3)), wbr(co(co(c3, c0, c4), cxad, cxne(co(c2, c0, c4))), cle, co(c2, c0, c3)), wbr(co(co(c2, c0, c4), cxad, cxne(co(c3, c0, c4))), cle, co(c2, c0, c3)))
  breqtrrd(co(co(c3, c0, c4), cxad, cxne(co(c2, c0, c4))), cle, co(c2, c0, c3), co(c3, c0, c2), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), w3a(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1))))
  sylan2b(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), w3a(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1)), wbr(co(co(c3, c0, c4), cxad, cxne(co(c2, c0, c4))), cle, co(c3, c0, c2)), w3a(wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c4, c1)))
  3ancoma(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1))
  xmetrtri(c0, c1, c3, c2, c4)
  3adant3r3(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1), wceq(co(c2, c0, c3), co(c3, c0, c2)))
  xmetsym(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  xmetrtri(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4)
  ifboth(co(co(c3, c0, c4), cxad, cxne(co(c2, c0, c4))), co(co(c2, c0, c4), cxad, cxne(co(c3, c0, c4))), wbr(co(co(c3, c0, c4), cxad, cxne(co(c2, c0, c4))), cle, co(c2, c0, c3)), wbr(co(co(c2, c0, c4), cxad, cxne(co(c3, c0, c4))), cle, co(c2, c0, c3)), wbr(cif(co(co(c3, c0, c4), cxad, cxne(co(c2, c0, c4))), co(co(c2, c0, c4), cxad, cxne(co(c3, c0, c4))), wbr(co(c2, c0, c4), cle, co(c3, c0, c4))), cle, co(c2, c0, c3)), wbr(co(c2, c0, c4), cle, co(c3, c0, c4)))
  breq1(co(co(c3, c0, c4), cxad, cxne(co(c2, c0, c4))), cif(co(co(c3, c0, c4), cxad, cxne(co(c2, c0, c4))), co(co(c2, c0, c4), cxad, cxne(co(c3, c0, c4))), wbr(co(c2, c0, c4), cle, co(c3, c0, c4))), cle, co(c2, c0, c3))
  breq1(co(co(c2, c0, c4), cxad, cxne(co(c3, c0, c4))), cif(co(co(c3, c0, c4), cxad, cxne(co(c2, c0, c4))), co(co(c2, c0, c4), cxad, cxne(co(c3, c0, c4))), wbr(co(c2, c0, c4), cle, co(c3, c0, c4))), cle, co(c2, c0, c3))

blocks.name: metrtri
blocks.content: Reverse triangle inequality for the distance function of a metric space. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-May-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm metrtri(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, c1)), w3a(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1))), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(co(c2, c0, c4), cmin, co(c3, c0, c4))), cle, co(c2, c0, c3)))
} = {
  eqbrtrrd(cfv(cabs, co(co(c2, c0, c4), cmin, co(c3, c0, c4))), cle, co(c2, c0, c3), co(co(c2, c0, c4), cfv(cds, cxrs), co(c3, c0, c4)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, c1)), w3a(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1))))
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, c1)), w3a(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1))), wceq(co(co(c2, c0, c4), cfv(cds, cxrs), co(c3, c0, c4)), cfv(cabs, co(co(c2, c0, c4), cmin, co(c3, c0, c4)))), wcel(co(c2, c0, c4), cr), wcel(co(c3, c0, c4), cr))
  3adant3r2(wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1), wcel(co(c2, c0, c4), cr))
  metcl(c0, c1, c2, c4)
  3adant3r1(wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1), wcel(co(c3, c0, c4), cr))
  metcl(c0, c1, c3, c4)
  xrsdsreval(co(c2, c0, c4), co(c3, c0, c4), cfv(cds, cxrs))
  sylan(wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, c1)), w3a(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1)), wbr(co(co(c2, c0, c4), cfv(cds, cxrs), co(c3, c0, c4)), cle, co(c2, c0, c3)), wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)))
  metxmet(c0, c1)
  xmetrtri2(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, cfv(cds, cxrs))
  eqid(cfv(cds, cxrs))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm metrtri(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈(Met ` c1)∧(c2 ∈ c1 ∧ c3 ∈ c1 ∧ c4 ∈ c1))→(abs `((c2[c0]c4)[-](c3[c0]c4)))[≤](c2[c0]c3))
} = {
  eqbrtrrd((abs `((c2[c0]c4)[-](c3[c0]c4))), cle, (c2[c0]c3), ((c2[c0]c4)[(dist ` ℝ*)](c3[c0]c4)), (c0 ∈(Met ` c1)∧(c2 ∈ c1 ∧ c3 ∈ c1 ∧ c4 ∈ c1)))
  syl2anc((c0 ∈(Met ` c1)∧(c2 ∈ c1 ∧ c3 ∈ c1 ∧ c4 ∈ c1)), ((c2[c0]c4)[(dist ` ℝ*)](c3[c0]c4))=(abs `((c2[c0]c4)[-](c3[c0]c4))), (c2[c0]c4)∈ ℝ, (c3[c0]c4)∈ ℝ)
  3adant3r2(c0 ∈(Met ` c1), c2 ∈ c1, c3 ∈ c1, c4 ∈ c1, (c2[c0]c4)∈ ℝ)
  metcl(c0, c1, c2, c4)
  3adant3r1(c0 ∈(Met ` c1), c2 ∈ c1, c3 ∈ c1, c4 ∈ c1, (c3[c0]c4)∈ ℝ)
  metcl(c0, c1, c3, c4)
  xrsdsreval((c2[c0]c4), (c3[c0]c4), (dist ` ℝ*))
  sylan(c0 ∈(Met ` c1), (c2 ∈ c1 ∧ c3 ∈ c1 ∧ c4 ∈ c1), ((c2[c0]c4)[(dist ` ℝ*)](c3[c0]c4))[≤](c2[c0]c3), c0 ∈(*Met ` c1))
  metxmet(c0, c1)
  xmetrtri2(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, (dist ` ℝ*))
  eqid((dist ` ℝ*))
}

blocks.name: xmetgt0
blocks.content: The distance function of an extended metric space is positive for unequal points. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm xmetgt0(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)), wb(wne(c2, c3), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c2, c0, c3))))
} = {
  necon1abid(c2, c3, w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c2, c0, c3)))

  bitr4d(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)), wbr(co(c2, c0, c3), cle, nat0), wceq(co(c2, c0, c3), nat0), wa(wbr(co(c2, c0, c3), cle, nat0), wbr(nat0, cle, co(c2, c0, c3))))
  biantrud(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)), wbr(co(c2, c0, c3), cle, nat0), wbr(nat0, cle, co(c2, c0, c3)))
  xmetge0(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  sylancl(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)), wb(wceq(co(c2, c0, c3), nat0), wa(wbr(co(c2, c0, c3), cle, nat0), wbr(nat0, cle, co(c2, c0, c3)))), wcel(co(c2, c0, c3), cxr), wcel(nat0, cxr))
  xrletri3(co(c2, c0, c3), nat0)
  sylancl(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)), wb(wbr(co(c2, c0, c3), cle, nat0), wn(wbr(nat0, clt, co(c2, c0, c3)))), wcel(co(c2, c0, c3), cxr), wcel(nat0, cxr))
  xmetcl(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  0xr()
  xrlenlt(co(c2, c0, c3), nat0)

blocks.name: metgt0
blocks.content: The distance function of a metric space is positive for unequal points. Definition 14-1.1(b) of [Gleason] p. 223 and its converse. (Contributed by NM, 27-Aug-2006.)

blocks.name: metn0
blocks.content: A metric space is nonempty iff its base set is nonempty. (Contributed by NM, 4-Oct-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 14-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm metn0(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, c1)), wb(wne(c0, emptycls), wne(c1, emptycls)))
} = {
  necon3bid(c0, emptycls, c1, emptycls, wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, c1)))
  syl6bb(wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, c1)), wceq(c0, emptycls), wceq(c1, emptycls), wceq(cxp(c1, c1), emptycls))
  bitrd(wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, c1)), wceq(c0, emptycls), wceq(cxp(c1, c1), emptycls), wceq(cdm(c0), emptycls))
  3syl(wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, c1)), wb(wceq(c0, emptycls), wceq(cdm(c0), emptycls)), wf(c0, cxp(c1, c1), cr), wrel(c0))
  frel(c0, cxp(c1, c1), cr)
  reldm0(c0)
  eqeq1d(cdm(c0), emptycls, cxp(c1, c1), wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, c1)))
  fdmd(c0, cxp(c1, c1), cr, wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, c1)))
  metf(c0, c1)
  bitri(wceq(cxp(c1, c1), emptycls), wceq(c1, emptycls), wo(wceq(c1, emptycls), wceq(c1, emptycls)))
  xpeq0(c1, c1)
  oridm(wceq(c1, emptycls))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm metn0(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈(Met ` c1)→(c0 ≠ ∅ ↔ c1 ≠ ∅))
} = {
  necon3bid(c0, emptycls, c1, emptycls, c0 ∈(Met ` c1))
  syl6bb(c0 ∈(Met ` c1), c0 = ∅, c1 = ∅, (c1 × c1)= ∅)
  bitrd(c0 ∈(Met ` c1), c0 = ∅, (c1 × c1)= ∅, dom(c0)= ∅)
  3syl(c0 ∈(Met ` c1), (c0 = ∅ ↔ dom(c0)= ∅), (c0 :(c1 × c1)→ ℝ), Rel(c0))
  frel(c0, (c1 × c1), cr)
  reldm0(c0)
  eqeq1d(dom(c0), emptycls, (c1 × c1), c0 ∈(Met ` c1))
  fdmd(c0, (c1 × c1), cr, c0 ∈(Met ` c1))
  metf(c0, c1)
  bitri((c1 × c1)= ∅, c1 = ∅, (c1 = ∅ ∨ c1 = ∅))
  xpeq0(c1, c1)
  oridm(c1 = ∅)
}

  syl13anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wcel(cv(hs2), c2))), wbr(co(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), cle, co(co(cv(hs2), c0, cv(hs0)), cxad, co(cv(hs2), c0, cv(hs1)))), wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(cv(hs2), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1))

  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c2)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cres(c0, cxp(c2, c2)), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))))

blocks.pretty:
thm xmetres2(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈(*Met ` c1)∧ c2 ⊆ c1)→(c0 |`(c2 × c2))∈(*Met ` c2))
} = {
  isxmetd(hs0, hs1, hs2, (c0 |`(c2 × c2)), c2, (c0 ∈(*Met ` c1)∧ c2 ⊆ c1))
  ssexd(c2, c1, dom(*Met), (c0 ∈(*Met ` c1)∧ c2 ⊆ c1))
  adantr(c0 ∈(*Met ` c1), c2 ⊆ c1, c1 ∈ dom(*Met))
  elfvdm(c0, cxmet, c1)
  fssresd(c0, (c2 × c2), cxr, (c1 × c1), (c0 ∈(*Met ` c1)∧ c2 ⊆ c1))
  adantr(c0 ∈(*Met ` c1), c2 ⊆ c1, (c0 :(c1 × c1)→ ℝ*))
  xmetf(c0, c1)
  sylancom(c0 ∈(*Met ` c1), c2 ⊆ c1, (c2 × c2)⊆(c1 × c1), c2 ⊆ c1)
  simpr(c0 ∈(*Met ` c1), c2 ⊆ c1)
  xpss12(c2, c1, c2, c1)
  bitrd(((c0 ∈(*Met ` c1)∧ c2 ⊆ c1)∧(hs0 ∈ c2 ∧ hs1 ∈ c2)), (hs0[(c0 |`(c2 × c2))]hs1)= 0, hs0 = hs1, (hs0[c0]hs1)= 0)
  eqeq1d((hs0[(c0 |`(c2 × c2))]hs1), nat0, (hs0[c0]hs1), ((c0 ∈(*Met ` c1)∧ c2 ⊆ c1)∧(hs0 ∈ c2 ∧ hs1 ∈ c2)))
  syl3anc(((c0 ∈(*Met ` c1)∧ c2 ⊆ c1)∧(hs0 ∈ c2 ∧ hs1 ∈ c2)), ((hs0[c0]hs1)= 0 ↔ hs0 = hs1), c0 ∈(*Met ` c1), hs0 ∈ c1, hs1 ∈ c1)

thm metres2(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wcel(cres(c0, cxp(c2, c2)), cfv(cmet, c2)))
} = {
  sylanbrc(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wcel(cres(c0, cxp(c2, c2)), cfv(cmet, c2)), wcel(cres(c0, cxp(c2, c2)), cfv(cxmet, c2)), wf(cres(c0, cxp(c2, c2)), cxp(c2, c2), cr))
  sylan(wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, c1)), wss(c2, c1), wcel(cres(c0, cxp(c2, c2)), cfv(cxmet, c2)), wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)))
  metxmet(c0, c1)
  xmetres2(c0, c1, c2)
  fssresd(c0, cxp(c2, c2), cr, cxp(c1, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, c1)), wss(c2, c1)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, c1)), wss(c2, c1), wf(c0, cxp(c1, c1), cr))
  metf(c0, c1)
  sylancom(wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, c1)), wss(c2, c1), wss(cxp(c2, c2), cxp(c1, c1)), wss(c2, c1))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, c1)), wss(c2, c1))
  xpss12(c2, c1, c2, c1)
  ismet2(cres(c0, cxp(c2, c2)), c2)
}

thm metres2(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈(Met ` c1)∧ c2 ⊆ c1)→(c0 |`(c2 × c2))∈(Met ` c2))
} = {
  sylanbrc((c0 ∈(Met ` c1)∧ c2 ⊆ c1), (c0 |`(c2 × c2))∈(Met ` c2), (c0 |`(c2 × c2))∈(*Met ` c2), ((c0 |`(c2 × c2)):(c2 × c2)→ ℝ))
  sylan(c0 ∈(Met ` c1), c2 ⊆ c1, (c0 |`(c2 × c2))∈(*Met ` c2), c0 ∈(*Met ` c1))
  metxmet(c0, c1)

  fssresd(c0, (c2 × c2), cr, (c1 × c1), (c0 ∈(Met ` c1)∧ c2 ⊆ c1))

  xpss12(c2, c1, c2, c1)
  ismet2((c0 |`(c2 × c2)), c2)

blocks.name: prdsdsf
blocks.content: The product metric is a function into the nonnegative extended reals. In general this means that it is not a metric but rather an *extended* metric (even when all the factors are metrics), but it will be a metric when restricted to regions where it does not take infinite values. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Aug-2015.)

thm resspwsds(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, class c10, wff w0) {

} = {
  ressprdsds(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, cfv(csca, c4), c5, c4, c6, cfv(csca, co(c4, cress, c7)), c7, universe, universe, c8, c9, c10, w0)

thm resspwsds(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, class c10, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 =(c1 |`(c2 × c2)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 =(c4[^]c5))

  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c6)
  ⊣ c1 =(dist ` c3)
  ⊣ c0 =(dist ` c6)
  ⊣ (w0 → c5 ∈ c8)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ c9)
  ⊣ (w0 → c7 ∈ c10)
} = {
  ressprdsds(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, (Scalar ` c4), c5, c4, c6, (Scalar `(c4[|`s]c7)), c7, universe, universe, c8, c9, c10, w0)
  eqtrd(c3, ((Scalar ` c4)[×](hs0 ∈ c5 ↦ c4)), (c4[^]c5), w0)
  syl6eq((c4[^]c5), ((Scalar ` c4)[×](hs0 ∈ c5 ↦ c4)), ((Scalar ` c4)[×](c5 × { c4 })), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, (c4[^]c5)=((Scalar ` c4)[×](c5 × { c4 })), c4 ∈ c9, c5 ∈ c8)
  pwsval(c4, c9, c5, c8, (c4[^]c5), (Scalar ` c4))
  eqid((c4[^]c5))
  eqid((Scalar ` c4))
  oveq2i((Scalar ` c4), cprds, (c5 × { c4 }), (hs0 ∈ c5 ↦ c4))
  fconstmpt(hs0, c5, c4)
  eqtrd(c6, ((Scalar `(c4[|`s]c7))[×](hs0 ∈ c5 ↦(c4[|`s]c7))), ((c4[|`s]c7)[^]c5), w0)
  syl6eq(((c4[|`s]c7)[^]c5), ((Scalar `(c4[|`s]c7))[×](hs0 ∈ c5 ↦(c4[|`s]c7))), ((Scalar `(c4[|`s]c7))[×](c5 × {(c4[|`s]c7)})), w0)
  sylancr(w0, ((c4[|`s]c7)[^]c5)=((Scalar `(c4[|`s]c7))[×](c5 × {(c4[|`s]c7)})), (c4[|`s]c7)∈ 𝕌, c5 ∈ c8)
  ovex(c4, cress, c7)
  pwsval((c4[|`s]c7), universe, c5, c8, ((c4[|`s]c7)[^]c5), (Scalar `(c4[|`s]c7)))
  eqid(((c4[|`s]c7)[^]c5))

  fconstmpt(hs0, c5, (c4[|`s]c7))

  fvexd(csca, (c4[|`s]c7), w0)

  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈ c5, c7 ∈ c10)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c((c4[|`s]c7))

  metcl(c7, c5, cv(hs2), cv(hs3))

thm imasf1omet(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈(Met ` c1))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 =(c3["s]c4))
  ⊣ (w0 → c5 =(Base ` c4))
  ⊣ (w0 →(c3 : c5 ↔ c1))
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ c6)
  ⊣ c7 =((dist ` c4)|`(c5 × c5))
  ⊣ c0 =(dist ` c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c7 ∈(Met ` c5))
} = {
  sylanbrc(w0, c0 ∈(Met ` c1), c0 ∈(*Met ` c1), (c0 :(c1 × c1)→ ℝ))
  imasf1oxmet(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, w0)
  sylanbrc(w0, (c0 :(c1 × c1)→ ℝ), c0[Fn](c1 × c1), ∀(hs0 ∈ c1, ∀(hs1 ∈ c1,(hs0[c0]hs1)∈ ℝ)))
  imasdsfn(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, (dist ` c4), w0)
  eqid((dist ` c4))
  mpbid(w0, ∀(hs0 ∈ c1, ∀(hs1 ∈ c1,(hs0[c0]hs1)∈ ℝ)), ∀(hs2 ∈ c5, ∀(hs1 ∈ c1,((c3 ` hs2)[c0]hs1)∈ ℝ)))
  mpbid(w0, ∀(hs2 ∈ c5, ∀(hs1 ∈ c1,((c3 ` hs2)[c0]hs1)∈ ℝ)), ∀(hs2 ∈ c5, ∀(hs3 ∈ c5,((c3 ` hs2)[c0](c3 ` hs3))∈ ℝ)))
  ralrimivva(hs2, hs3, c5, c5, w0, ((c3 ` hs2)[c0](c3 ` hs3))∈ ℝ)
  eqeltrd(((c3 ` hs2)[c0](c3 ` hs3)), cr, (hs2[c7]hs3), (w0 ∧(hs2 ∈ c5 ∧ hs3 ∈ c5)))
  imasdsf1o(c3, hs2, c0, hs3, c7, c2, c4, c5, c1, c6, (w0 ∧(hs2 ∈ c5 ∧ hs3 ∈ c5)))
  adantr(w0, (hs2 ∈ c5 ∧ hs3 ∈ c5), c2 =(c3["s]c4))
  adantr(w0, (hs2 ∈ c5 ∧ hs3 ∈ c5), c5 =(Base ` c4))
  adantr(w0, (hs2 ∈ c5 ∧ hs3 ∈ c5), (c3 : c5 ↔ c1))
  adantr(w0, (hs2 ∈ c5 ∧ hs3 ∈ c5), c4 ∈ c6)
  adantr(w0, (hs2 ∈ c5 ∧ hs3 ∈ c5), c7 ∈(*Met ` c5))
  syl(w0, c7 ∈(*Met ` c5), c7 ∈(Met ` c5))
  metxmet(c7, c5)
  simprl(w0, hs2 ∈ c5, hs3 ∈ c5)
  simprr(w0, hs2 ∈ c5, hs3 ∈ c5)
  sylan(w0, (hs2 ∈ c5 ∧ hs3 ∈ c5), (hs2[c7]hs3)∈ ℝ, c7 ∈(Met ` c5))
  3expb(c7 ∈(Met ` c5), hs2 ∈ c5, hs3 ∈ c5, (hs2[c7]hs3)∈ ℝ)
  metcl(c7, c5, hs2, hs3)
  ralbidv(hs2, c5, w0, ∀(hs3 ∈ c5,((c3 ` hs2)[c0](c3 ` hs3))∈ ℝ), ∀(hs1 ∈ c1,((c3 ` hs2)[c0]hs1)∈ ℝ))
  bitr3d(w0, ∀(hs3 ∈ c5,((c3 ` hs2)[c0](c3 ` hs3))∈ ℝ), ∀(hs1 ∈ c1,((c3 ` hs2)[c0]hs1)∈ ℝ), ∀(hs1 ∈ ran(c3),((c3 ` hs2)[c0]hs1)∈ ℝ))
  syl(w0, (∀(hs1 ∈ ran(c3),((c3 ` hs2)[c0]hs1)∈ ℝ)↔ ∀(hs3 ∈ c5,((c3 ` hs2)[c0](c3 ` hs3))∈ ℝ)), c3[Fn]c5)
  ralrn(hs1, hs3, c3, c5, ((c3 ` hs2)[c0]hs1)∈ ℝ, ((c3 ` hs2)[c0](c3 ` hs3))∈ ℝ)
  eleq1d(((c3 ` hs2)[c0]hs1), cr, ((c3 ` hs2)[c0](c3 ` hs3)), hs1 =(c3 ` hs3))
  oveq2(hs1, (c3 ` hs3), (c3 ` hs2), c0)
  raleqdv(hs1, ran(c3), c1, w0, ((c3 ` hs2)[c0]hs1)∈ ℝ)
  bitr3d(w0, ∀(hs2 ∈ c5, ∀(hs1 ∈ c1,((c3 ` hs2)[c0]hs1)∈ ℝ)), ∀(hs0 ∈ c1, ∀(hs1 ∈ c1,(hs0[c0]hs1)∈ ℝ)), ∀(hs0 ∈ ran(c3), ∀(hs1 ∈ c1,(hs0[c0]hs1)∈ ℝ)))

  f1ofn(c3, c5, c1)

  syl(w0, (c3 : c5 ↠ c1), (c3 : c5 ↔ c1))
  f1ofo(c3, c5, c1)
  forn(c3, c5, c1)
  ffnov(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c1, cr)
  ismet2(c0, c1)
  diff.hs2.s(hs3)
  diff.hs3.c(c5)
  diff.hs2.w(w0)
  diff.hs3.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs3)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c5)
  diff.hs3.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.w(((c3 ` hs2)[c0](c3 ` hs3))∈ ℝ)
  diff.hs3.w(((c3 ` hs2)[c0]hs1)∈ ℝ)
  diff.hs1.c(ran(c3))
  diff.hs1.c(c1)

  diff.hs0.c(c5)

blocks.name: xpsdsfn
blocks.content: Closure of the metric in a binary structure product. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm xpsdsfn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wfn(c0, cxp(cxp(c1, c2), cxp(c1, c2))))
  -| wceq(c3, co(c4, cxps, c5))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, c7))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cds, c3))
} = {
  imasdsfn(c0, cxp(c1, c2), c3, ccnv(cmpo(hs0, hs1, c1, c2, ccnv(co(csn(cv(hs0)), ccda, csn(cv(hs1)))))), co(cfv(csca, c4), cprds, ccnv(co(csn(c4), ccda, csn(c5)))), crn(cmpo(hs0, hs1, c1, c2, ccnv(co(csn(cv(hs0)), ccda, csn(cv(hs1)))))), universe, cfv(cds, co(cfv(csca, c4), cprds, ccnv(co(csn(c4), ccda, csn(c5))))), w0)
  xpsval(hs0, hs1, c3, cmpo(hs0, hs1, c1, c2, ccnv(co(csn(cv(hs0)), ccda, csn(cv(hs1))))), co(cfv(csca, c4), cprds, ccnv(co(csn(c4), ccda, csn(c5)))), c4, c5, c1, c2, c6, c7, cfv(csca, c4), w0)
  xpslem(hs0, hs1, cmpo(hs0, hs1, c1, c2, ccnv(co(csn(cv(hs0)), ccda, csn(cv(hs1))))), co(cfv(csca, c4), cprds, ccnv(co(csn(c4), ccda, csn(c5)))), c3, c4, c5, c1, c2, c6, c7, cfv(csca, c4), w0)
